title: GRACE KARIN 2024 Women's Summer Floral Print Flowy A Line Maxi Dresses Sleeveless Smocked Off Shoulder Dress
description: 【FEATURES】Two way to wear: Sleeveless or off shoulder, Smocked front waist, Smocked back bodice,Hidden zip at left side, Left front slit design, Flared A-Line silhouette, Hits at ankle, Fully lined.

【TWO WAYS TO WEAR】You can wear it as a sleeveless dress or a drop off shoulder dress,which design shows your charming shoulders, collabone and back. Unique Smocked bodice design allows you to adjust to perfect comfort.
【OCCASIONS】The casual flowy maxi dress is easy to pair with Earring, Necklace, Heels, Sunglasses, Hats, High Heel, Sandals For Vacation/Beach/Wedding/Nigh Out/Birthday/Date/Ball,etc.
【COMFY FABRIC】Women’s floral smocked maxi dress made of soft and breathable chiffon fabric keeps you pleasant And comfortable all day.
【WASHING CARE】Recommend hand washing or washing in a lingerie bag in a machine,and hang dry, color separately
